body_html:
The only issue I can see here is that na_value comes before name. I know that's where it belongs, but that's a breaking change for people who are not using named args (as they obviously should).

So, in the BUILD file, mark decode_csv "hidden", and then write a python wrapper which swaps the last two arguments.

@josh11b @asimshankar This is an interesting case -- the fault here lies with the generated python wrapper. I suppose that means we need another wrapper around the wrapper for every argument change. It is all very ugly. @annarev this will all be so much better once the API generation is in!
